components.description: A symbol representing Blood Type AB. Displayed as the letters AB on a red background.
components.title: Negative Squared AB

description: A symbol representing Blood Type AB. Displayed as the letters AB on a red background.
title: Negative Squared AB

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Enclosed Alphanumeric Supplement -> White on black squared Latin letters
emoji_net_data.definition: A symbol representing Blood Type AB. AB Button (blood Type) was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name ‚ÄúNegative Squared AB‚Äù http://emojipedia.org/negative-squared-ab/
emoji_net_data.name: AB button (blood type)

apple_vendor_description: Apple's AB blood type emoji is a clean, clinical representation, appearing as a smooth, slightly raised button with the letters 'AB' rendered in crisp white against a deep red background. The glossy finish and subtle 3D shading on Apple devices give it a polished, medical feel, symbolizing this specific blood group. It's a concise way to communicate blood type information within Apple's ecosystem, often used in health-related contexts or personal profiles.
